name: "Urban Jungle" Men's Fitted T-Shirt
description: It's a jungle out there..... I think graffiti artists are some of the most talented people out there. From the cartoonish symbols, to artistic word designs, I think it's awesome. Especially the larger than life pieces, the size of my work is contained to a computer screen where I can zoom in and out, I can only imagine what it must be like put together a mural. Perhaps I'll have to try my hand at it someday. This is one of my favorite designs. I feel it's quite symbolic and is full of powerful images that stir emotion. I have some more graffiti inspired art on the way, so keep your eye's peeled! Shirt and Ink / Print Info: All our designs are printed on Fitted Anvil 980's (hugs your body a little, emphasizes your shape) using environmentally friendly waterbase and discharge ink for a soft hand / feel to the print. 4.5 oz Pre-Shrunk 100% Ringspun Cotton makes for a lightweight super comfortable tee. Machine wash warm with like colors, tumble dry medium and please, oh please don't iron that awesome design! Designed by Tim Clay

name: "Hail Mary" Men's Fitted T-Shirt
description: Ahhhh, the design that started it all..... I was inspired to create this design one day while on a short lunch break from work. Instead of going the same sandwich shop I had gone to for the past few weeks, I decided to head in the other direction to give the new guys on the block a shot. And in doing so, walked past an art gallery where one of the featured pieces in the front window was a hooded figure with a padlock over their mouth. I thought it was super awesome, and thought about it all whilst devouring my newfound joy, the Peppered Blue Cheese Steak Sandwich. Delish. Many, many, many drafts later, I had my first finished design. I'm a big fan of pretty faces, and find this design to be particularly attractive (not that I'm going to start dating a t-shirt anytime soon). I have since returned to that new sandwich shop time and time again for one of the most delicious sandwich creations known to man, always stopping by to glance in the window at the art gallery and look for some new inspiration. Shirt and Ink / Print Info: All our designs are printed on Fitted Anvil 980's (hugs your body a little, emphasizes your shape) using environmentally friendly waterbase and discharge ink for a soft hand / feel to the print. 4.5 oz Pre-Shrunk 100% Ringspun Cotton makes for a lightweight super comfortable tee. Machine wash warm with like colors, tumble dry medium and please, oh please don't iron that awesome design! Designed by Tim Clay and Aaron Roderick

name: "Porn Star" Men's Fitted T-Shirt
description: Oh, you naughty little t-shirt you..... I LOVE this design. Total throwback to the "adult movies" of old. I originally wanted to put her on a polar bear-skin rug in front of a fireplace! That would've been so sick! But it ended up being too complicated. Originally this design was pink instead of purple, but it ended up looking a bit too 'fleshy' lol. Finding a decently designed men's shirt with a purple color scheme is hard as hell, and when I couldn't find one I got the whole idea to design my own shirts in the first place. Needless to say, this shirt gets A LOT of attention when you go out. I always get people coming up to me and asking me about it, and usually end up with a nickname or two by the end of the night! Great conversation starter! Shirt and Ink / Print Info: All our designs are printed on Fitted Anvil 980's (hugs your body a little, emphasizes your shape) using environmentally friendly waterbase and discharge ink for a soft hand / feel to the print. 4.5 oz Pre-Shrunk 100% Ringspun Cotton makes for a lightweight super comfortable tee. Machine wash warm with like colors, tumble dry medium and please, oh please don't iron that awesome design! Designed by Tim Clay

name: "Green Piece" Men's Fitted T-Shirt
description: Break yo' self, foo'..... I love the play on words here. When I first showed it a friend, he tried to tell me that piece was spelt "P-E-A-C-E" lol, and then it dawned on him. I was inspired by other designs similar to this one, and wanted one a little more stylistic than some of the simpler ones out there. The GTA font totally fits the attitude, and I once contemplated put a skyline through the bottom of the text, but it detracted from the legibility of the print. Get this shirt and stick your friends up with a couple of super-soakers! Shirt and Ink / Print Info: All our designs are printed on Fitted Anvil 980's (hugs your body a little, emphasizes your shape) using environmentally friendly waterbase and discharge ink for a soft hand / feel to the print. 4.5 oz Pre-Shrunk 100% Ringspun Cotton makes for a lightweight super comfortable tee. Machine wash warm with like colors, tumble dry medium and please, oh please don't iron that awesome design! Designed by Tim Clay

name: "Geisha" Men's Fitted T-Shirt
description: Japanese themed art rocks my socks..... From the koi fish, to the samurai, to bonzai trees, I find it all super groovy. I plan on doing a bunch more when I have the chance, and probably have 30 million ideas floating around in my head right now. I originally was going to incorporate many other Japanese themed designs on the shirt along with the geisha, but it ended up looking best with her being the main focal point. I like the mystery the fan provides, it kind of makes you want to take a peek and see what's behind it. Shirt and Ink / Print Info: All our designs are printed on Fitted Anvil 980's (hugs your body a little, emphasizes your shape) using environmentally friendly waterbase and discharge ink for a soft hand / feel to the print. 4.5 oz Pre-Shrunk 100% Ringspun Cotton makes for a lightweight super comfortable tee. Machine wash warm with like colors, tumble dry medium and please, oh please don't iron that awesome design! Designed by Tim Clay
